text: Bhargava Law College is a private law school situated at Samba, Samba district in the Indian union territory of Jammu and Kashmir. It offers undergraduate 3 years law courses, 5 Year Integrated LL.B. courses, approved by Bar Council of India (BCI), New Delhi and affiliated to University of Jammu. ==History== Bhargava Law College was established in 2008 by the Rattana Devi Gopal Dass Memorial Trust in Samba. ==References== Category:Educational institutions established in 2008 Category:2008 establishments in India Category:Samba district Category:Law schools in Jammu and Kashmir
title: Bhargava Law College
